messages.subject: Fw: FYI Yahoo Maintenance
messages.msgSnippet: Just received this from another group.  Looks like there is going to be a long weekend.  Wonder how long it will be after that before mail is back to normal.
messages.messageBody:
Just received this from another group. Looks like there is going to be a long weekend. Wonder how long it will be after that before mail is back to normal.

Lynda, thoroughly sick of all the Yahoo maintenance and down times and thinking Topica and SmartGroups are looking better all the time!
----- Original Message -----

HEADS UP!

Yahoo Groups will be down from March 15th until March 18th
for more maintenance! So in light of this news, next weekend
will be rather quiet to say the very least! Normal service is set to resume March 18th Late..... Please pass this news on to as
many people as you know that use Yahoo Groups


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
